Package edu.ncsu.csc216.stp.model.manager

Class TestPlanManager

java.lang.Object
edu.ncsu.csc216.stp.model.manager.TestPlanManager
public class TestPlanManager extends Object
A class that manages a set of system test plans. Its data includes a boolean value that determines if the current instance recently underwent alterations, a sorted list of test plans, a list of the failing tests from all of those test plans, and a current test plan. It provides the functionality to load and save test plans from file, add a test plan to the list, remove a test plan from the list, edit a test plan, get the current test plan, set the current test plan, add test cases to a test plan, add results to a test case, clear its fields, and get the names of its test plans.
Author:
Cole Sanders

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    TestPlanManager()
    Constructs a TestPlanManager and initializes the testPlans field to an empty list, failingTestList to an empty FailingTestList, the currentTestPlan to failingTestList, and is changed to false.

  • Constructor Details

    • TestPlanManager

      public TestPlanManager()
      Constructs a TestPlanManager and initializes the testPlans field to an empty list, failingTestList to an empty FailingTestList, the currentTestPlan to failingTestList, and is changed to false.

  • Method Details

    • loadTestPlans

      public void loadTestPlans(File file)
      Loads test plans in a sorted list from the file passed in as a parameter.
      Parameters:
      file - the file containing the test plans
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the file cannot be read.

    • saveTestPlans

      public void saveTestPlans(File file)
      Writes the list of current test plans to a file.
      Parameters:
      file - the file the test plans will be written to.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if they are unable to be written to file.

    • isChanged

      public boolean isChanged()
      Gets isChanged.
      Returns:
      the value of the field isChanged

    • addTestPlan

      public void addTestPlan(String testPlanName)
      Creates a test plan with the given name and adds it to the list in sorted order.
      Parameters:
      testPlanName - the name of the test plan to be created and added.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the name is the same as the name of the failing tests list.
      IllegalArgumentException - if the name is already the name of a test plan in the list.

    • getTestPlanNames

      public String[] getTestPlanNames()
      Gets an array list of the test plan names starting with the failing tests list
      Returns:
      an array of test plan names

    • setCurrentTestPlan

      public void setCurrentTestPlan(String name)
      Sets the current test plan to the test plan with the same name as the parameter value. If no such test plan exists in the list the current test plan is set to the failing tests list.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the current test plan to be set

    • getCurrentTestPlan

      public AbstractTestPlan getCurrentTestPlan()
      Gets the current test plan.
      Returns:
      the current test plan

    • editTestPlan

      public void editTestPlan(String name)
      Sets the name of the current test plan to the passed in string parameter.
      Parameters:
      name - the name being set to the current test plan.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the current test plan being edited is the failing tests list
      IllegalArgumentException - if the name parameter is set to the name of the failing tests list
      IllegalArgumentException - if another test plan in the list already uses the passed in name

    • removeTestPlan

      public void removeTestPlan()
      Removes the current test plan if it is not the failing tests list.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the current test plan is the failing tests list.

    • addTestCase

      public void addTestCase(TestCase testCase)
      Adds a test case to the current test plan if it is an instance of TestPlan. The failing test list is updated if the test is failing.
      Parameters:
      testCase - the test case being added to the current test plan.

    • addTestResult

      public void addTestResult(int index, boolean passing, String actualResults)
      Adds a test result to the test case at the passed in index of the current test plan. Updates the failing tests list.
      Parameters:
      index - the index of test case being updated.
      passing - a boolean that represents whether or not a test case passed.
      actualResults - the actual results description of a test case.

    • clearTestPlans

      public void clearTestPlans()
      Sets the testPlans field to an empty list, failingTestList to an empty FailingTestList, the currentTestPlan to failingTestList, and is changed to false.
